Package hippodrome

Class BettingCentre

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.BettingCentre

  • public class BettingCentre
extends java.lang.Object
    Place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse. As they come here to place their bets, they also come here to collect his (or hers) further gains, if such a scenario applies on a given race.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BettingCentre​(int numberOfHorses, int numberOfSpectators, GeneralInformationRepository repository)
      Creates a Betting Centre.

      Returns number of horses that the BettingCentre has knowledge of.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BettingCentre

        public BettingCentre​(int numberOfHorses,
                     int numberOfSpectators,
                     GeneralInformationRepository repository)
        Creates a Betting Centre.
        This constructor creates a Betting Centre giving a number of pairs Horse/Jockeys, a number of Spectators. Plus, an instance of the repository is also given in order to report status changes on the course of its actions.
        Parameters:
        numberOfHorses - the number of pairs Horse/Jockeys which will compete against one another.
        numberOfSpectators - the number of Spectators which will attend the events.
        repository - an instance of a GeneralInformationRepository in order to report all the actions and log each and every moment.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptTheBets

        public void acceptTheBets​()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the Broker to Waiting for Bets (WFB) and waits till the last placeABet(int, int, int) is done by a Spectator.
        This method also notifies the Spectators when the bets are accepted.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • honourTheBets

        public void honourTheBets​()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the Broker to Settling Accounts (SA) and waits till the last goCollectTheGains() is done by a Spectator.
        This method also notifies the Spectators when the Broker is about to give their money.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • placeABet

        public int placeABet​(int spectator,
                     int bet,
                     int horse)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the Spectator's state to Placing a Bet (PAB) and lets a Spectator place a bet onto the BettingCentre.
        This bet, made by a specific spectator is done respecting a proper horse, which represents a pair Horse/Jockey.
        After all the Spectators have placed their bets, the Broker will then accept them.
        Parameters:
        spectator - an identification of a Spectator which represents a better.
        bet - an amount of money represented as an integer, which the spectator wants to bet.
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey in which the spectator wants to bet.
        Returns:
        the amount of money which was accepted by the Broker to place the bet.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • goCollectTheGains

        public int goCollectTheGains​()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the Spectator's state to Collecting the Gains (CTG) and lets a spectator collect all his (or hers) gains after being placed a bet and a race had ended.
        After the Broker alerted that its honouring the bets, each Spectator must then execute this method in order to collect its gains.
        Returns:
        the amount of money collected by the spectator, as an integer.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • haveIWon

        public boolean haveIWon​(int spectatorId)
        Verification if a given Spectator identified with spectatorId has won his (or hers) bet.
        Parameters:
        spectatorId - identification of Spectator who has placed a bet earlier and wants to verify if it did win indeed or not.
        Returns:
        true if spectator has won his (or hers) bet; otherwise, it will return false.

      • areThereAnyWinners

        public boolean areThereAnyWinners​(int winner)
        Verification of bet's winners.
        Parameters:
        winner - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which have won the race.
        Returns:
        true if anybody had won indeed; otherwise it will return false.

      • getNumberOfHorses

        public int getNumberOfHorses​()
        Returns number of horses that the BettingCentre has knowledge of.
        Returns:
        number of horses, as an integer.

      • setAbility

        public void setAbility​(int horse,
                       int ability)
                throws UnknownHorseJockeyException
        Sets the ability of a pair Horse/Jockey on a internal structure in order to evaluate its odds later.
        Parameters:
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey.
        ability - the ability of the pair Horse/Jockey identified with horse.
        Throws:
        UnknownHorseJockeyException - if the pair Horse/Jockey horse does not exists.
